title: Astros, Yankees Set for a Heavyweight Clash for the American League Pennant
text:
HOUSTON—The Tampa Bay Rays pushed the Houston Astros to the brink of humiliation, a scrappy underdog with a microscopic payroll forcing baseball’s best team to fight for its life. They drew blood against a foe that looked all but invincible and conjured visions of a historic division series upset.

But faced with the possibility of an embarrassing early exit from the playoffs, the Astros revealed their true identity in Thursday night’s decisive Game 5, re-establishing themselves as World Series favorites. In the process, they...
description: Houston was pushed to the brink by Tampa Bay, but their elite starting pitching, led by Gerrit Cole, is why they are still the team to beat.
